mapper.insert:
insert into CLOB_TEST (COLUMN1, COLUMN2, COLUMN3, COLUMN4, CLOB_ID, CLOB_VALUE )
(select #{item.column1,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.column2,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.column3,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.column4,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.clobId,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.clobValue,jdbcType=CLOB} from dual )
